name: Sean Simulator
description:
Introducing Sean Simulator - the epic tale of a lone red guy named Sean, who bravely battles against hordes of green monkey mice in a world gone mad.

Created using Python and Pygame, this game will have you on the edge of your seat as you guide Sean through hordes of green rectangles.

Can you survive the apocalypse and emerge victorious as the ultimate rectangle warrior? Play Sean Simulator and find out!
